value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Here we are, Seth—our final battle
together. Win, and I'll free you.$k$pOf course, even if you don't, the
power of the contract will fade on its
own. You'll be freed either way.$k$pAnd when that happens, you can
march right back to the adorable
Ephraim and Eirika. How wonderful!$k$p$WmMPID_ゼト,ch08_02_Seth_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Indeed. That is my hope.$k$pHowever, Princess Veronica, if I may
be permitted to say one last thing...$k$pIt is true that I am not a knight of your
kingdom.$k$pBut I do sincerely wish that, one day,
you become a good ruler. For the
sake of your citizens...$k$pAnd for your own sake as well.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|A true demonstration of strength. I
understand what that means now...$k$pI cannot say that I like how this ended.
It took outsiders to win us our
freedom.$k$pStill, I must offer my thanks. Next we
meet, I will lend you my skills.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Welcome home, my dear. I trust that
things went smoothly.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Is this what you seek?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Oh, my, yes. Thank you, darling. It is.
This is precisely what I need: Naglfar.$k$p$EFace|With this tome in hand, my king's
vessel will move. All that is left is to
build a bridge over the southern sea...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You know, dear...we're becoming
better and better friends all the time!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pYour king... Is he a good ruler?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, my. Did the general's words sting?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|No... Forget I asked. It doesn't matter.$k$p$EFace|What's really important—$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes, dear. Of course, of course. I'll
hold up my end of the bargain. My
king will lend you his might.$k$pYou really do want to see Askr and
that Summoner burn, don't you?$k$p$Sbs150|
